title: The Future of Block Construction: How Shared vs. Independent Sequencing Is Impacting Users
description:
This talk will discuss shared sequencing products (Astria, Espresso, Radius) which were developed to enhance decentralization and security via distributed transaction ordering with independent sequencing (native Mainnet L2 sequencers i.e. Base, OP) and confirmation times, sequencer margins, risks to centralization and the impact on end users.

The talk will go into: 
1. Confirmation + App UX 
2. RevShare for Builders
3. Gas 
4. Reliability + TX costs for end user
5. TX Condition types + wallets
